code: import React from"react";import EditLocation from"../EditLocation";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ListLocations=_ref=>{let{locationList,getLocations}=_ref;const deleteLocation=async id=>{await fetch("/api/locations/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE"});getLocations();};return locationList.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"no-location",children:"No locations found."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"location-list",children:locationList.sort((a,b)=>a.name>b.name?1:-1).map((location,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location-list-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"name",children:location.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditLocation,{location:location,getLocations:getLocations}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>{deleteLocation(location.location_id);},children:"Delete"})]})]},location.location_id);})});};export default ListLocations;
